Body: Description: We have someone trying to send a large excel document to another employee via email. Since our internal email domains are added to an allow list and that allow list is added to our content aware policies this should be bypassed an allowed. However it is still being blocked by the policy as shown in the log.
What We've Learned Updated: Email domain allowlist is not working as expected.
Next Steps Updated: A remote session will be scheduled with the customer for Monday or Tuesday.

What We've Learned Updated: 31Jan: Settings looked okay on the EPP server.

Email domain allowlist is not working as expected.

Next Steps Updated: 31Jan: Waiting on customer to schedule a remote session with one of the end users to test this and generate some logs and also add their computers(they had the user already selected in the CAP policy) and also make sure the Outlook addin is enabled on their end.

---
A remote session will be scheduled with the customer for Monday or Tuesday.
